Khonkolor::

Khonkolor looked and thought " if I use my blaster, I'm a bad boy; If 
I don't use it, I'm a bas soldier..."after though asecond he said to 
himself "Khonkolor, you're a bad boy"

He fired 25 times against Bongiovi

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Bongiovi:
> 
> 
> 
> Realing back in pain from the punch Bongiovi was stunned, leaving 
him open 
> for attack.
